title: Understanding Online Learning Platforms Through Quantitative and Qualitative Analysis of MOOC Characteristics

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals with advanced language specialization, conducting hands-on practice in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting

learning_goals: Learners can analyze quantitative characteristics of MOOCs (e.g., number of completers, offered fields)
Learners can evaluate qualitative characteristics of MOOCs (e.g., instructional structure, assessment tools)
Learners can propose effective online learning platform design strategies based on analytical results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
